title: KinesisDataFirehose with AWS Lambda for Transformation
description: Create a Kinesis DataFirehose and Java Lambda function to transform the stream of data

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use AWS Lambda (Java runtime) to transform the stream of data from a Kinesis DataFirehose with error handling and retries using Java
This example uses AWS CDK constructs

bullets.text: AWS CDK Construct for KinesisDataFirehose Data Transformation using Lambda

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
